proposals.job_title: Build AI Chatbot for Cross-Platform App
proposals.description: We need an AI chatbot for our mobile app using automation tools like Zapier and n8n. The chatbot should handle customer inquiries and integrate with our existing systems.
Looking for automation expert to integrate our CRM with make.com workflows. Need to automate lead processing and follow-up sequences.
We need a no-code automation specialist to build workflows using Zapier and Airtable. Project involves automating our entire sales pipeline.

proposals.job_title: Creat Google Contacts via n8n to Notion 2-way sync
proposals.description:
Hello!
I bought this template https://n8n.io/workflows/2814-2-way-sync-google-contacts-and-notion/ The template is complex and I need you to fully set it up and modify it to my workflow.
I have 94 fields in my Google Contacts and they all need to sync error free to my Notion database. As there are many nodes there will be a lot of fields’ mapping (i.e. manual work).
You need to have a solid understanding of n8n, Google People API, and Notion. And have a powerful workstation/laptop and good inter...
proposals.message:
I noticed you're struggling with manual processes in your general business.

Having automated 200+ similar businesses, I can help you save 15+ hours weekly through smart integrations.

My approach:
1. Map your current workflow and identify bottlenecks
2. Build custom automations using N8N, Api
3. Train your team and provide documentation

Last month, I helped a similar client reduce manual work by 70% while improving accuracy.

I'd love to discuss your specific needs. When would be a good time for a quick call?

Best,
Timothy

proposals.description:
We are looking for a detail-oriented freelancer to extract data from Google regarding the personal status of a list of athletes (exact personal details of status to be provided in contract). The ideal candidate will compile the findings into a well-organized spreadsheet (provided).

There are approximately 7000 names that need to be googled and status to be checked. 

Accuracy and attention to detail are crucial for this task - we will be checking the validity of findings.

We are fine if you us...

proposals.description: We are seeking a skilled professional to troubleshoot and resolve issues with our QuickBooks Online (QBO) and Salesforce integration. The ideal candidate will not only fix current problems but also provide insights and recommendations for future improvements. Strong analytical skills and a deep understanding of both platforms are essential. If you have a proven track record in resolving integration issues and optimizing workflows, we want to hear from you!

proposals.description:
We’re looking for a skilled Python developer to help build and maintain a custom module for a crypto trading platform. This integration will allow automated trading strategies to interface with a spot exchange via secure REST and WebSocket APIs. The initial focus is on developing a core module for order execution and account management, with plans to expand into more advanced features over time.

Initial Responsibilities:
- Develop a plugin that supports:
	Market and limit order creation
	Order ...

proposals.description:
Responsibilities:

Customize workflows, reports, and forms in the Stock and Accounting modules.

Implement user-specific requirements and optimizations.

Configure system settings, including warehouses, item master data, GL accounts, and taxes.

Test and document the customization.

Collaborate with internal teams for integration and validation.

proposals.job_title: Cybersecurity Consultant – CrowdStrike Falcon & Microsoft Security
proposals.description:
We are seeking an experienced Cybersecurity Consultant with deep hands-on expertise in CrowdStrike Falcon and Microsoft’s security ecosystem—including Microsoft 365 Defender, Intune, Azure AD (Entra ID), and related tools.

This is a project-based consulting opportunity focused on assessing and optimizing an existing CrowdStrike Falcon deployment. The consultant will lead a structured evaluation and provide actionable recommendations for improving endpoint protection, identity security, and inte...

Job Title:
Social Media Assistant with Graphic Design Skills | Weekly Carousels + B-Roll Videos

Job Description:
I’m looking for a reliable, creative Social Media Assistant to support my weekly content production across platforms like Instagram, Threads, and Pinterest. You’ll primarily be responsible for putting together carousel posts and editing simple video content using assets and guidance I provide.
